attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Just turning eighteen myself, I have always thought about the good times I would have being legal to drink and go clubbing, I had the idea that I was able to get in anywhere Unfourtunatley that was far from true as I had been turned down countless times from club's stating they are over 21's. What is the purpose of this? What is it that over 21's do in clubs that make them able to have clubs to themselves? So I petiton that these clubs be banned so fellow 18 year olds like myself can enjoy nights out as it should be without pointless restrictions.
